name: Red Solstice 2: Survivors - Howell-Barrex Inc.
storyline:
The fall of Elysium and Tharsis has brought about a shift in the corporate world. Now standing at the top, Howell-Barrex Incorporated is now the dominant corporation. You will play as the Strike Commander, and follow the story of Edward Howell, General Barrex, and the Iron Hawks.

The war with STROL is about to begin, but it will be a short one as Howell-Barrex Inc. brings an impressive array of firepower to the table.
summary: Experience a new story line with new characters and settings. Take on the role as the Strike Commander and bring victory to Howell-Barrex Inc.
